document_title.description: The main title of the document.

executive_summary.description: A concise, 4-5 sentence executive summary of the document's purpose and overall findings.

key_findings.description: A list of 3 of the most critical, high-level conclusions or data points from the entire PDF.

section_summaries.description: A list of summaries for the major content chunks of the document.

page_range.description: The range of pages covered by this summary (e.g., '1-10').

summary_points.description: Exactly 3 distinct bullet points summarizing the core content of this page range.
